title: reniloml
author: reniloml
content: Hey everyone!I'm trying to get some initial feedback on a new project I'm working on. The concept is simple, revolutionise the way real estate development projects in the UK are funded.By harnessing blockchain protocols we allow our web3 community to fund the development of real-world assets all through our self-serve platform; moving away from reliance on traditional institutions, we give the power of lucrative development financing to the people.I know this is a very brief and simple description so if you'd like me to share more details alongside our website and whitepaper feel free to drop a comment below.I would really appreciate it âš¡Thank you in advance for your time

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Of course, the community does, you don't have to ask just drop your website and your whitepaper so the community can analyze, since you are inviting feedback, some feedback could be bad and hopefully, that's ok with you.Are you going to launch crowdfunding and do you have a working platform so people can test and give it feedback.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Do you need translation, advertising? I can do reverse psychology advertising, reverse shilling etc.

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: When it comes to real estate and Bitcoin, I'm always interested in discovering new projects and ideas.Can you tell us a little bit more about the way people will finance themselves their projects ?QuoteI know this is a very brief and simple description so if you'd like me to share more details alongside our website and whitepaper feel free to drop a comment below.Do you already have an online website that we could see?I would be interesed to check it and to read your whitepaper if it is already done.Will followup your topic, have a great day!

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: reniloml on April 05, 2023, 10:28:28 AMI'm trying to get some initial feedback on a new project I'm working on. The concept is simple, revolutionise the way real estate development projects in the UK are funded.Real estate, bitcoin, wealth? Let me guess, will you create a new token for UK or Metaverse?Unfortunately, you will not find someone to fund your idea here, especially when you are giving general information and you do not have an actual project to be evaluated, so it is better to think about something well-defined or look for a developer to formulate your idea for you.

comments.author: WillyAp
comments.body: Quote from: reniloml on April 05, 2023, 10:28:28 AMBy harnessing blockchain protocols we allow our web3 communityWhat is a web3 Community? Web3 is a standart still not implemented. Show your website rather than buzzwords

comments.author: Ndabagi01
comments.body: Try to update the thread with the necessary information (such as your website's name and a white paper) needed to evaluate your project in order to receive feedback from users here. Feedback from forum users here always has a significant impact on ensuring that your project is satisfactory amongst other projects. It could be positive or negative feedback, but it will help to make a great project. The brief description you provided of the proposed project appears to make sense, and I hope you will be able to secure sufficient resources to make the project a reality.

comments.author: moneystery
comments.body: Quote from: reniloml on April 05, 2023, 10:28:28 AMBy harnessing blockchain protocols we allow our web3 community to fund the development of real-world assets all through our self-serve platform; moving away from reliance on traditional institutions, we give the power of lucrative development financing to the people.It is always interesting when someone wants to implement blockchain and WEB3 technology to their project. I will certainly help to be able to provide suggestions and comments for the projects you are developing. You can include a link and website to your project so I can visit it immediately.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: reniloml on April 05, 2023, 10:28:28 AMBy harnessing blockchain protocols we allow our web3 community to fund the development of real-world assets all through our self-serve platformFar too many buzz-words here. I also tend to believe you are trying to get a yet-another-token project advertised under the appearance of this kind of questions.If you truly believe in your idea, why don't you try to fund it and develop it, at least until the stage of proof-of-concept? Because if it's that good, I'm sure you'll get proper funding afterwards.
